mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM qna WHERE id = #{param1}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, Q.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM qna WHERE id = #{param2} ORDER BY qseq DESC) Q) WHERE rn >= #{param1.startNum}) WHERE rn <= #{param1.endNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qseq, id, subject, content) VALUES (qseq.nextVal, #{id}, #{subject}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE qna SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content} where qseq = #{qseq}
